title: API Error Testing with Mocks
description: Test various error scenarios for an API client by mocking different response types including network errors, server errors, and validation errors.
instructions: Complete the test suite by creating mock implementations of the fetch function that simulate different error conditions. Test handling of 400, 404, 500 errors and network failures.

hints.text: Use mockResponse(status, data) to create responses with different status codes
For network errors, the mock function should throw an error instead of returning a response
